MemoryInfobox.location: Epidauros Akropolis, Foundry of Hephaistos, Argolis

General_Description: '''The Floor is Lava''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Rumors are erupting that a precious relic was sent to be destroyed at the [[Foundry of Hephaistos]]. Dive down the throat of the volcano and be mindful of your footing. Some have been scorched trying to recover me.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found a bronze statue being melted down inside the [[Foundry of Hephaistos]] caldera and recovered the engraving.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The name of the [[Ainigmata Ostraka]] is a reference of the popular kid's game with the same name where if you touch the floor, you lose.
